full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SENG GIS GDONG PA CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,SENG GIS GDONG PA CAN GYI GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL NI BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,YE SHES MKHA' 'GRO SENG GIS GDONG PA CAN GYI TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES YE SHES MKHA' 'GRO MA SENG GE'I GDONG CAN GYI BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS BZLOG BYED 'DI NI MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA BYANG DAM SNYOM PA'I BSAM PAS BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, ,BSNGO BA SMON LAM BKRA SHIS BYA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
